snippet: Documents released to The New York Times through the civilian lawyer of Major Nidal Malik Hasan provide the first account in his own words of his deadly shooting rampage at the Fort Hood Army base in November 2009.
lead_paragraph: Documents released to The New York Times through the civilian lawyer of Major Nidal Malik Hasan provide the first account in his own words of his deadly shooting rampage at the Fort Hood Army base in November 2009.

headline.main: Sanity Board Report for Major Nidal Malik Hasan
